fecth_error: Unexpected Error, Check your internet connection

Landing.text1: Huge and infinite gifts will be given to everyone
Landing.text2: Eons will bring with it a Scientific and Technological advance of more than 10,000 years in the next decade.
Landing.text3: Knowledge, light, healing, love, abundance and happiness will be spread in all directions.
Landing.text4: A huge and colossal unprecedented mass Spiritual Awakening will bring about the Infinite Age of White Magic.
Landing.text5: Eons is the midpoint where Science, Technology, Mysticism, Light and Occult Sciences converge. One of our main objectives is to promote the expansion and evolution of consciousness at an Existential level.
Landing.text6: We present our first product now available:
Landing.text7: Technology of Access to the Existential Source
Landing.text8: The first real, authentic and absolutely verifiable Communication System with all Spiritual Planes.
Landing.text9: Also providing a unique real-time divination and prediction service.
Landing.text10: It doesn't matter who you are or what position you are in. With the arrival of Eons, your life will evolve infinitely in all aspects.
Landing.text12: Eons has begun an unstoppable outcome that will take humanity to a Universal scale.
Landing.text13: The combination of a concept of the most advanced and refined technology, together with a concept of the Purest and Enlightened Spirituality, describe the Essence that Eons will transmit at all times.
Landing.text14: New products and services will be presented.

Auth.invalid_pass_text: *Invalid Password, must contain between 8 and 16 characters
Auth.unauthorized: Your credentials are not correct, verify your email and password

Verification.title: Validate your email account
Verification.message: You will soon receive an email with the key to validate your account

Throw.question: Which symbol fell up?
Throw.question_throw_stop3: They both fell standing and mounted

RessetPassword.title: Recover password
RessetPassword.dont_exist_error: This email does not belong to any account
RessetPassword.message: Correctly enter the email associated with your account. You will soon receive an email with the key to reset your password

ChangePassword.title: Recover password
ChangePassword.message: Enter the new password correctly that you will associate with your account. Use it to log in later
ChangePassword.label: New Password

Spiritual_Family.empty_1: No Spirits have been added to the Spirit Family yet!
Spiritual_Family.empty_2: There are 2 ways in which a Spirit can be added:
Spiritual_Family.empty_4: 2- That it is presented through the use of the System.

Services.first_text_1_1: Access Technology to the Existential Source
Services.first_text_2: We have the approval of ALL Spiritual and Conscientious Planes. So it doesn't matter where our Users are on the Material Plane, their Spiritualities are surely already aware of us.
Services.first_text_3: When making contact with our System, the User's Spirituality is automatically channeled. At the same time, multiple Consecrations are automatically activated momentarily.
Services.first_text_4: This allows us to make momentary use of universal chance to access ALL Spiritual and Conscious Planes.
Services.step_1: At all times the User will be automatically supported by both our Providence System and our Spiritual Security System. Both recognized and approved by the current Existential Laws. When a User leaves our System, we automatically restore any changes made by us.
Services.step_2: The level of usability that a User will be able to make of our System is determined exactly by the level of Consciousness and the level of Spirituality that said User possesses.
Services.step_3: Cuando un Usuario sale de nuestro Sistema, de forma automática restablecemos todo cambio realizado por parte nuestra.
Services.third_text_1: we have been very careful with the adjustment of Existential Knowledge to the current average View of Humanity. Adjustment that will be dispersed as we advance in the Deployment Phases. Until finally said adjustment disappears completely.
Services.third_text_2: It was never about choosing what to believe in and what not to believe. It was always about knowing what really exists.
Services.third_text_3: Finally the Light will allow you to contemplate the beautiful Era that with much love and Infinite Sacrifice we have built for you:

ServiceMenu.day_dialog: How will my day go today?
